urls.description: Some areas of Par and St Blazey become flooded after extreme rainfall and with the effects of climate change this will only increase. Cornwall Council and the Environment Agency have worked together to develop more than thirty natural flood management and urban infrastructure designs to reduce the flood risk to Par and St. Blazey. See where the work will be carried out in the Places section below. You can find drawings and details of the design in the Drawings area on this page. An example of an attenuation pond
